serverless-cloud-function-application: 本示例配置了 COS 触发器，当有文件上传到对应的 COS bucket时，会触发云函数执行，并把文件下载到本地临时目录，用做后续处理
该云函数需要配置 COS 触发器，另外在使用本示例代码时需要在函数里修改 appid、secret_id、secret_key
腾讯云无服务器云函数团队
This demo need to config COS trigger. When object has been upload to COS bucket, the SCF will download it to /tmp.
You should config COS trigger before you use it. Please change the appid,secret_id,secret_key
